org.springframework.expression

接口 MethodFilter

  • 函数接口:
    这是一个函数接口, 因此可用作 lambda 表达式或方法引用的赋值目标。

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface MethodFilter
    MethodFilter instances allow SpEL users to fine tune the behaviour of the method resolution process. Method resolution (which translates from a method name in an expression to a real method to invoke) will normally retrieve candidate methods for invocation via a simple call to 'Class.getMethods()' and will choose the first one that is suitable for the input parameters. By registering a MethodFilter the user can receive a callback and change the methods that will be considered suitable.
    从以下版本开始:
    3.0.1

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      List<Method> filter(List<Method> methods)
      Called by the method resolver to allow the SpEL user to organize the list of candidate methods that may be invoked.

    • 方法详细资料

      • filter

        List<Method> filter(List<Method> methods)
        Called by the method resolver to allow the SpEL user to organize the list of candidate methods that may be invoked. The filter can remove methods that should not be considered candidates and it may sort the results. The resolver will then search through the methods as returned from the filter when looking for a suitable candidate to invoke.
        参数:
        methods - the full list of methods the resolver was going to choose from
        返回:
        a possible subset of input methods that may be sorted by order of relevance
